ModMetaData.name: Allow Dead Animals
ModMetaData.author: Andrew Raphael Lukasik
ModMetaData.description:
Simple mod that auto-allows freshly killed animals for butchering.
Made for people tired of constantly manually looking around for animals killed by wild predators to steal their meal.
Source code: https://github.com/andrew-raphael-lukasik/rimworld-mod_allow-dead-animals
Known issues: - Mod filters corpses by race property "Animal" so some undesirable ones may fit this cathegory, for example, insectoids are considered animals for some reason. - Mod doesn't recognize corpses forbidden manually by player and will re-allow them. - No option to turn it off mid-game (but it's 100% safe to remove it from mod list at any time).
